title: Amazing Egypt
ready: Get ready for a fun journey!

cairo.title: Cairo
cairo.description: The capital of Egypt, home to the Giza Pyramids and the Sphinx. A bustling city where history meets modernity.
cairo.fact: Cairo is home to the only remaining Wonder of the Ancient World!

alex.title: Alexandria
alex.description: The Pearl of the Mediterranean. Famous for its library and ancient lighthouse.
alex.fact: Alexander the Great founded this city!

luxor.title: Luxor
luxor.description: The world's greatest open-air museum. Explore the Valley of the Kings and Karnak Temple.
luxor.fact: Luxor contains about a third of the world's most valuable monuments!

aswan.title: Aswan
aswan.description: A beautiful city on the Nile. Visit the High Dam and Philae Temple.
aswan.fact: The ancient Egyptians gathered stones for their obelisks here!

hurghada.title: Hurghada
hurghada.description: A paradise for snorkeling and diving in the Red Sea.
hurghada.fact: The Red Sea is one of the saltiest bodies of water in the world!
